title: What's new in the world of conversational AI
description:
In this episode of the AI Show https://aka.ms/AIShow/Composer, Seth, Gary Pretty and Vishesh Oberoi showcase how Azure Bot Service’s new telephony channel and Bot Framework Composer’s recent enhancements complement each other. 

Jump to:
00:00 Welcome
01:01 What is Azure Bot Service?
02:10 What's new in Azure Bot Service? Telephony Channel
03:46 How Telephony Channel is used  
07:02 Telephony Channel Demo
11:25 Where to go to learn more: https://aka.ms/AIShow/TelephonyDoc
12:05 What is Bot Framework Composer?
12:52 Bot Framework Composer Demo
21:38 How to use Package Manager
23:07 Seth calls the Bot
25:25 Barge-in or Allow Interrupt
28:31 Learn more
